Pre-Game Insights: Jordi Fernandez was a Nuggets assistant coach for six years, helping to mold the team into winners and laying down the blueprint for his current job with the Nets.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Jordi Fernandez joined Cleveland in 2009 as a developmental coach while Malone was a Cavaliers assistant.
Others: Ben Simmons, who scored 10 points and had seven assists, and Day’Ron Sharpe (seven points, five rebounds) returned to the court Friday. Cam Johnson (right ankle sprain) and D’Angelo Russell (right shin contusion) were out and are considered day-to-day. Trendon Watford (left hamstring strain) most likely won’t play until the Nets return home.
